Standard form elements

Standard form elements

Guidelines on form element styles.

On this page
  • Text fields
  • Select option fields
  • Form buttons
  • Text box / button combinations
  • Date picker
  • Examples and assets

Text fields

Text box

View state:

Descriptive error message

CSS styles

label {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
input {
    height: 52px;
    padding: 10px;
    border: solid 1px #495C74;
}
input:focus {
    outline: none;
    border: solid 3px #254F90;
}
input.error {
    border: solid 3px #D2201E;
}
input.disabled {
    border: solid 1px #E2E2E2;
    background-color: #F5F5F5;
}
p.error-message {
    color: #D2201E;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}

Text area

View state:

0 of 100 characters used

Descriptive error message

CSS styles

label {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
textarea {
    padding: 10px;
    border: solid 1px #495C74;
}
textarea:focus {
    outline: none;
    border: solid 3px #254F90;
}
textarea.error {
    border: solid 3px #D2201E;
}
textarea.disabled {
    border: solid 1px #E2E2E2;
    background-color: #F5F5F5;
}
p.error-message {
    color: #D2201E;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}

Text box with units

View state:

$AUD.00

Descriptive error message

CSS styles

label {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
input {
    height: 52px;
    padding: 10px;
    border: solid 1px #495C74;
}
input:focus {
    outline: none;
    border: solid 3px #254F90;
}
input.error {
    border: solid 3px #D2201E;
}
input.disabled {
    border: solid 1px #E2E2E2;
    background-color: #F5F5F5;
}
span.units {
    color: #666666;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
    border: solid 1px #495C74;
    background-color: #F5F5F5;
}

    color: #D2201E;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;

}

Select option fields

Select box

View state:

Descriptive error message

CSS styles

label {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
select {
    height: 52px;
    padding: 10px;
    border: solid 1px #495C74;
}
select:focus {
    outline: none;
    border: solid 3px #254F90;
}
select.error {
    border: solid 3px #D2201E;
}
select.disabled {
    border: solid 1px #E2E2E2;
    background-color: #F5F5F5;
}
select.icon {
    color: #4569A0;
    height: 10px;
    width: 16px;
}

    color: #D2201E;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;

}

Radio buttons

View state:

Descriptive error message

CSS styles

.radio-group-label {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
.input-group-wrapper {
    height: 52px;
    padding: 10px;
    border: solid 1px #495C74;
}
.input-group-wrapper:focus {
    outline: none;
    border: solid 3px #254F90;
}
.input-group-wrapper.error {
    border: solid 3px #D2201E;
}
.input-group-wrapper.disabled {
    border: solid 1px #E2E2E2;
    background-color: #F5F5F5;
}
.radio-button {
    border: solid 2px #AAB2C3;
    height: 24px;
    width: 24px;
}
.radio-button-label {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
.radio-button-label:focus {
    color: #254F90;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
}
.radio-button-label.error {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
}
.radio-button-label.disabled {
    color: #8E8E8E;
    font-family: OpenSans;
}
p.error-message {
    color: #D2201E;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}

Multiple select list

View state:

Descriptive error message

CSS styles

.multiple-select-group-label {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
.checkbox {
    height: 28px;
    width: 28px;
    border: solid 1px #495C74;
}
.checkbox:focus {
    outline: none;
    border: solid 3px #254F90;
}
.checkbox.error {
    border: solid 3px #D2201E;
}
.checkbox.disabled {
    border: solid 1px #E2E2E2;
    background-color: #F5F5F5;
}
.checkbox-label {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
.checkbox-label:focus {
    color: #254F90;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
}
.checkbox-label.error {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
}
.checkbox-label.disabled {
    color: #8E8E8E;
    font-family: OpenSans;
}
p.error-message {
    color: #D2201E;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}

Form buttons

Primary action button

View state:

Submit

CSS styles

Button container
.primary-button {
    border: 2px solid #254F90;
    border-radius: 6px;
    padding: 8px 32px;
    text-align: center;
    background: #4569A0;
    box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 2px 4px 0px;
    transition-property: transform, -webkit-transform;
    transition-duration: 0.4s, 0.4s;
    transition-timing-function: ease, ease;
    transition-delay: 0s, 0s; 
}
.primary-button:hover {
    border: 2px solid #18335C;
    background: #254F90;
    box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 4px 8px 0px;
    transform: translateY(-.1875rem);
}
.primary-button:active {
    border: 2px solid #18335C;
    background: #18335C;
    box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 4px 8px 0px;
    transform: translateY(-.1875rem);
}
.primary-button.disabled {
    border: 2px solid #C7C7C7;
    text-align: center;
    background: #FFFFFF;
    box-shadow:none;
}
Button text
a {
    color: #FFFFFF;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 16px
    line-height: 28px;
}
a.disabled {
    color: #8E8E8E;
}

Secondary action button

View state:

Previous

CSS styles

Button container
.secondary-button {
    background: #FFFFFF;
    border: 2px solid #4569A0;
    box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 2px 4px 0px;
    border-radius: 6px;
    padding: 8px 32px;
    text-align: center;
    letter-spacing: 0;
    transition-property: transform, -webkit-transform;
    transition-duration: 0.4s, 0.4s;
    transition-timing-function: ease, ease;
    transition-delay: 0s, 0s;  
}
.secondary-button:hover {
   background: #254F90;
   border: 2px solid #18335C;
   transform: translateY(-.1875rem);
   box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 4px 8px 0px;
}
.secondary-button:active {
   background: #18335C;
   border: 2px solid #18335C;
}
.secondary-button.disabled {
    border: 2px solid #C7C7C7;
    text-align: center;
    background: #FFFFFF;
    box-shadow:none;
}
Button text
a {
    color: #4569A0;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 16px
    line-height: 28px;
}
a:hover {
    color: #FFFFFF;
}
a:active {
    color: #FFFFFF;
}
a.disabled {
    color: #8E8E8E;
}

Button group

View state:

Cancel
Save

CSS styles

Primary button container
.primary-button {
    border: 2px solid #254F90;
    border-radius: 6px;
    padding: 8px 32px;
    text-align: center;
    background: #4569A0;
    box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 2px 4px 0px;
    transition-property: transform, -webkit-transform;
    transition-duration: 0.4s, 0.4s;
    transition-timing-function: ease, ease;
    transition-delay: 0s, 0s; 
}
.primary-button:hover {
    border: 2px solid #18335C;
    background: #254F90;
    box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 4px 8px 0px;
    transform: translateY(-.1875rem);
}
.primary-button:active {
    border: 2px solid #18335C;
    background: #18335C;
    box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 4px 8px 0px;
    transform: translateY(-.1875rem);
}
.primary-button.disabled {
    border: 2px solid #C7C7C7;
    text-align: center;
    background: #FFFFFF;
    box-shadow:none;
}
Primary button text
a {
    color: #FFFFFF;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 16px
    line-height: 28px;
}
a.disabled {
    color: #8E8E8E;
}
Tertiary link
a {
    color: #254F90;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    text-decoration: underline;
    font-size: 16px
    line-height: 28px;
}
a:hover {
    color: #254F90;
}
a:active {
    color: #18335C;
}
a.disabled {
    color: #8E8E8E;
}

Add form field button

View state:

Add another subsidiary

CSS styles

Button text
a {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px
    line-height: 28px;
}
a:hover {
    color: #254F90;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
}
a:active {
    color: #18335C;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
}
a.disabled {
    color: #8E8E8E;
    font-family: OpenSans;
}
Button icon
.icon {
    color: #4569A0;
    height: 32px;
    width: 32px;
}
.icon:hover {
    color: #254F90;
}
.icon:active {
    color: #18335C;
}
.icon.disabled {
    color: #8E8E8E;
}

Text box / button combinations

Text box combined with primary button

View state:

Add

Descriptive error message

CSS styles

Label
label {
    color: #333333;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}
Text field
input {
    height: 52px;
    padding: 10px;
    border: solid 1px #495C74;
}
input:focus {
    outline: none;
    border: solid 3px #254F90;
}
input.error {
    border: solid 3px #D2201E;
}
input.disabled {
    border: solid 1px #E2E2E2;
    background-color: #F5F5F5;
}
Primary button container
.primary-button {
    border: solid 1px #495C74;
    border-radius: 6px;
    border-top-left-radius: 0px;
    border-bottom-left-radius: 0px
    padding: 10px 24px;
    text-align: center;
    background: #4569A0;
}
.primary-button:focus {
    background: #254F90;
    solid 3px #254F90;
}
.primary-button:active {
    background: #18335C;
    solid 3px #254F90;
}
.primary-button.error {
    border: solid 3px #D2201E;
    background: #4569A0;
}
.primary-button.disabled {
    border: 2px solid #C7C7C7;
    text-align: center;
    background: #FFFFFF;
    box-shadow:none;
}
Primary button text
a {
    color: #FFFFFF;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 16px
    line-height: 28px;
}
a.disabled {
    color: #8E8E8E;
}
Icon
.icon {
    color: #FFFFFF;
    height: 14px;
    width: 14px;
}
Error message
p.error-message {
    color: #D2201E;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    letter-spacing: 0.2px;
    line-height: 28px;
}

    padding: 10px 24px;
    text-align: center;
}

   background: #254F90;
